# Welcome to headscale[¶](#welcome-to-headscale "Permanent link")

Headscale is an open source, self-hosted implementation of the Tailscale control server.

This page contains the documentation for the latest version of headscale. Please also check our [FAQ](about/faq/).

Join our [Discord server](https://discord.gg/c84AZQhmpx) for a chat and community support.

## Design goal[¶](#design-goal "Permanent link")

Headscale aims to implement a self-hosted, open source alternative to the [Tailscale](https://tailscale.com/) control server. Headscale\'s goal is to provide self-hosters and hobbyists with an open-source server they can use for their projects and labs. It implements a narrow scope, a *single* Tailscale network (tailnet), suitable for a personal use, or a small open-source organisation.

## Supporting headscale[¶](#supporting-headscale "Permanent link")

Please see [Sponsor](about/sponsor/) for more information.

## Contributing[¶](#contributing "Permanent link")

Headscale is \"Open Source, acknowledged contribution\", this means that any contribution will have to be discussed with the Maintainers before being submitted.

Please see [Contributing](about/contributing/) for more information.

## About[¶](#about "Permanent link")

Headscale is maintained by [Kristoffer Dalby](https://kradalby.no/) and [Juan Font](https://font.eu).
